quotes.quote: Existence itself is disconcerting and disorienting.
Whatever in creation exists without my knowledge exists without my consent.
Existence is a series of footnotes to a vast, obscure, unfinished masterpiece.
Any existence deprived of freedom is a kind of death.
The existence of other people is essentially awkward.
Existence for eternity could get a little boring... especially towards the end.
Existence would be intolerable if we were never to dream.
The meaning of existence is that you have simply existed at all.
Existence is larger than any model that is not itself the exact size of existence.
In one drop of water are found all the secrets of all the oceans; in one aspect of You are found all the aspects of existence.
Freedom is not to defy, it is to co-exist. It is a challenge for the imagination
Sameness of existence. Conformity is inevitable. So is search
The existence of virtue depends entirely upon its use.
Existence really is an imperfect tense that never becomes a present.
Existence is not a mystery unless you think it has a meaning.
Fight for your existence and when doing this, try to be just to others! You have no job other than this in this universe!
In the wild struggle for existence, we want to have something that endures, and so we fill our minds with rubbish and facts, in the silly hope of keeping our place.
Existence itself is nothing if not an amazement. Good poems restore amazement.
The mystery of existence is the connection between our wins and our losses.
Existence itself does not feel horrible; it feels like an ecstasy, rather, which we have only to be still to experience.
Existence was really very simple when you did what you were told.
Every time a value is born, existence takes on a new meaning; every time one dies, some part of that meaning passes away.
Existence is no more than the precarious attainment of relevance in an intensely mobile flux of past, present, and future.
The very purpose of existence is to reconcile the glowing opinion we hold of ourselves with the appalling things that other people think about us.
The existence of things does not depend on the existence of words.
The life of inner peace, being harmonious and without stress, is the easiest type of existence.
The whole existence of man is a ceaseless duel between the forces of life and death.
Existence is where the soul goes to learn how to interpret itself again.
Existence was not only absurd, it was plain hard work.
Existence is self-enjoyment, by means of some object distinct from ourselves.
And the existence is tedious, anyway; it is a senseless, dirty business, this life.
Existence in itself, taken at its least miraculous, is a miracle.
The existence of a majority logically implies a corresponding minority.
The basic fact about human existence is not that it is a tragedy, but that it is a bore. It is not so much a war as an endless standing in line
No existence can be validly fulfilled if it is limited to itself.
The continued existence of wildlife and wilderness is important to the quality of life of humans.
Every moment of one's existence one is growing into more or retreating into less. One is always living a little more or dying a little bit.
Existence always helps those who live in tune with their nature!
It is impossible to imagine existence void of any intelligence.
If your existence does not make any difference, you are no more than a dead body.
The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed.
Existence is the end of endless eternity without a beginning or an end.
All that makes existence valuable to any one depends on the enforcement of restraints upon the actions of other people.
The simplicity of existence is that it is. The complexity of existence is that it is not.
The existence of forgetting has never been proved: We only know that some things don't come to mind when we want them.
Existence is Identity, consciousness is identification.
The existence of a man is so small a thing to take, so mighty a thing to employ.
Existence must be asserted in the present if one does not want all life to be defined as an escape toward nothingness.
You only exist because of the agreements you made with yourself and with the other humans around you.
Existence is a mystery , and one should accept it as a mystery and not pretend to have any explanation .
